title: Support/Toplaner Plat 3 searching for Clash Team
body:
Hey guys, 
I'm looking for a clash team for the weekend.
My main role is **Support**, but i play a lot **Toplane **for soloQ. My rank is **Plat 3 57LP** atm.
MY foreign language is german, but i'm fine to speak english. I highly prefere using Teamspeak, because I'm a communicative player with a good gamesense.
So if have you want me just sent a friend Request to **No Mana For Ult** in League
